export var questionObj={"Qtext":"
 
It is given that two numbers are in the ratio \(5 : 7 \). If 3 is added to each of the numbers, the ratio becomes \(3 : 4 \). Then find the numbers
\newline
","Steps":[{"id":"s1","n_params":2,"step_txt":"$$\text{
Since the numbers are in the ratio $7 : 5 $, we can take them as $z 7 $, and $z 5 $.
According to give information, we can write}$$
\[
	(\input[s1v1]{} z + 3 ):(7 z + 3 ) = \input[s1v2]{} : 4 
\]"},{"id":"s2","n_params":0,"step_txt":"
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{5 z + 3 }{7 z + 3 } = \frac{3 }{4 }
\]
"},{"id":"s3","n_params":2,"step_txt":"
\[
	\Rightarrow 20 z + \input[s3v1]{} = \input[s3v2]{} z + 9 
\]
"},{"id":"s4","n_params":2,"step_txt":"
\[
	z = \frac{9 - \input[s4v1]{} }{\input[s4v2]{} - 21 }
\]"},{"id":"s5","n_params":1,"step_txt":"

\[
	z = \frac{\input[s5v1]{} }{-1 }
\]
"},{"id":"s6","n_params":1,"step_txt":"
\[z = \input[s6v1]{} 
\]"},{"id":"s7","n_params":1,"step_txt":"$$\text{
So, first number is $5 (z ) = \input[s7v1]{} $
Second number is $ 7 (z ) = 21 $
\newline}$$
"}]};export var resp=[{"data":[5,3],"text":"$$\text{Given the ratio $7 : 5 $, the two numbers can be expressed as $z 7$ and $z 5$, thus, their sum and ratio can be written as }$$\[
	(5 z + 3 ):(7 z + 3 ) = 3 : 4 
\] $$

"},{"data":[],"text":" 
"},{"data":[12,21],"text":"$$\text{Cross Multiplying both sides we get the following equation \[
	 20 z + 12 = 20 z + 9//} 
\] "},{"data":[12,20],"text":"$$\text{Taking constant terms on one side, and variable terms on other side, and then dividing the result of the constant term by the difference in coefficients of variable we get}$$ \[
	z = \frac{9 - 12 }{20 - 21 }
\]"},{"data":[-3],"text":"$$$\text{
Solving the subtraction we get}$$
 \[ z = \frac{-3 }{-1 }
\]
"},{"data":[3],"text":"$$\text{Dividing both the numerator and denominator by their greatest common divisor we get \[ z = 3
\]
"},{"data":[15],"text":" $$\text{Putting the value of $ z = 3 $ in $5 z $, and $7 z $, we get the numbers as 15 and 21.}%
"}];

sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
It is given that two numbers are in the ratio \(5 : 7 \). If 3 is added to each of the numbers, the ratio becomes \(3 : 4 \). Then find the numbers
\newline
", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "$$\text{
Since the numbers are in the ratio $7 : 5 $, we can take them as $z 7 $, and $z 5 $.
According to give information, we can write}$$
\[
	(\input[s1v1]{} z + 3 ):(7 z + 3 ) = \input[s1v2]{} : 4 
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{5 z + 3 }{7 z + 3 } = \frac{3 }{4 }
\]
"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow 20 z + \input[s3v1]{} = \input[s3v2]{} z + 9 
\]
"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	z = \frac{9 - \input[s4v1]{} }{\input[s4v2]{} - 21 }
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "

\[
	z = \frac{\input[s5v1]{} }{-1 }
\]
"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "
\[z = \input[s6v1]{} 
\]"}, {"id": "s7", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "$$\text{
So, first number is $5 (z ) = \input[s7v1]{} $
Second number is $ 7 (z ) = 21 $
\newline}$$
"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [5, 3], "text": "$$\text{Given the ratio $7 : 5 $, the two numbers can be expressed as $z 7$ and $z 5$, thus, their sum and ratio can be written as }$$\[
	(5 z + 3 ):(7 z + 3 ) = 3 : 4 
\] $$

"}, {"data": [], "text": " 
"}, {"data": [12, 21], "text": "$$\text{Cross Multiplying both sides we get the following equation \[
	 20 z + 12 = 20 z + 9//} 
\] "}, {"data": [12, 20], "text": "$$\text{Taking constant terms on one side, and variable terms on other side, and then dividing the result of the constant term by the difference in coefficients of variable we get}$$ \[
	z = \frac{9 - 12 }{20 - 21 }
\]"}, {"data": [-3], "text": "$$$\text{
Solving the subtraction we get}$$
 \[ z = \frac{-3 }{-1 }
\]
"}, {"data": [3], "text": "$$\text{Dividing both the numerator and denominator by their greatest common divisor we get \[ z = 3
\]
"}, {"data": [15], "text": " $$\text{Putting the value of $ z = 3 $ in $5 z $, and $7 z $, we get the numbers as 15 and 21.}%
"}]
